text: Ernani do Amaral Peixoto Airport , is the airport serving Itaperuna, Brazil. ==History== The airport is dedicated to general aviation. ==Airlines and destinations== No scheduled flights operate at this airport. ==Access== The airport is located from downtown Itaperuna. ==See also== *List of airports in Brazil ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:Airports in Rio de Janeiro (state)
title: Itaperuna Airport
